Description: Activates scenario sweeps via ``run.scenarios``. When true, Snakemake iterates over the entries defined in the external scenarios file and merges their overrides into the base config.

Values: Path relative to the repo root
Description: YAML file listing scenario overrides (default ``config/scenarios.yaml``). Each scenario may override any valid configuration key; ``config_provider``/``get_config`` ensure the merged values are honoured per wildcard combination.
